section.title: Do You Need Help?
section.para: If you experience difficulty with a procedure described in this documentation, visit the JBoss Tools website at . Through the JBoss Tools website, you can:

listitem.para: search or browse through a knowledgebase of technical support articles in the wiki.
view video tutorials on how to use the tools.
participate in discussions in the user forum.
keep up to date with changes via the blog, mailing list and News and Noteworthy web page.

section.title: Give us Feedback
section.para: If you find a typographical error, or know how this guide can be improved, we would love to hear from you. Submit a report in JIRA at against the project Documentation for JBoss Tools and Developer Studio (TOOLSDOC).
Fill out the following template in JIRA's Description field. Be as specific as possible when describing the issue; this will help ensure that we can fix it quickly.
section.screen:

section.para: Be sure to give us your name so that you can receive full credit for reporting the issue.
